name: BiggerPicture
headline: Scheduling automation platform between trucking and warehousing
description: BiggerPicture is a B2B SaaS solution that automates the scheduling of pick-up and delivery times for trucking companies and warehouses. 75% of shipments are still scheduled over phone calls and emails.

founders.name: Deema Adada, Founder
founders.description: Deema spent 15 years in leadership roles at Coyote Logistics and Uber Freight, driving significant innovation in the supply chain industry.  During that time, she felt the acute challenges of siloed technology and workflows across the supply chain resulted in less than 1% of shipments could be handled without human intervention, which propelled her to found BiggerPicture.

founders.name: Guillaume Lo Re, Founder
founders.description: During his 13 years working at startups as well as hyper-growth companies such as Datadog and Dassault Systèmes, Guillaume developed a passion for solving complex problems with simple solutions. He takes pride in shaping and crafting stunning user experiences for high volume and critical applications.

# Digital Supply Chain Transformation
## AI-Agent for Logistics
### Transform your supply chain operations with BiggerPicture’s end-to-end AI-powered solution. By capturing and learning from real-time and historical scheduling data, our system identifies disruptions and proactively resolves them—ensuring seamless coordination between shippers, carriers, and warehouses.
![biggerpicture dock scheduler five stars](https://biggerpicture.co/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/biggerpicture-dock-scheduling-five-stars.svg)

## Deliver Shipments On-Time, To and from The Dock
### BiggerPicture's AI-driven solution connects shippers, carriers, and warehouses for synchronized planning and execution. By leveraging predictive analytics and real-time data, every shipment's performance is continuously optimized throughout its journey. Our system dynamically adapts to stakeholder constraints, ensuring an agile, resilient, and efficient supply chain.
![biggerpicture scheduling software screenshot notification](https://biggerpicture.co/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/biggerpicture-scheduling-software-screenshot-notification-uai-258x171.png)
![scheduling](https://biggerpicture.co/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/scheduling.svg)
### Unified Scheduling
Experience the ease of BiggerPicture’s unified approach. Centralize and manage all inbound and outbound shipments, eliminating manual tasks and fragmented workflows.
![connections](https://biggerpicture.co/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/connections.svg)
### Synchronized Partner Coordination
We unlock real-time collaboration, providing a single source of truth across the entire appointment execution journey. Experience a real-time data bridge for insightful, aligned decisions to maximize your full potential.
![v](https://biggerpicture.co/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/ai-powered.svg)
### AI-Powered Scheduling
Elevate scheduling with BiggerPicture’s Scheduler. We tap into deep network insights to forecast the most optimal appointment slots, ensuring a synchronization that satisfies every stakeholder. Navigate scheduling challenges effortlessly with BiggerPicture's optimization suite.
![v](https://biggerpicture.co/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/adjust.svg)
### Adaptive Execution Management
BiggerPicture continuously monitors shipments, promptly recognizing risks and proposing swift remedies. Ensuring resilient and agile supply chain for every journey.

#### What customers are saying
> "Being able to maintain a resilient warehouse operation is crucial in distinguishing oneself from competitors when presenting to potential customers. Showing the ability to adjust to fluctuations in customer demand and external supply chain disruptions solidifies a strong risk management approach. This is precisely why BiggerPicture is the ultimate solution for warehouses seeking to execute a streamlined and optimized operational plan."3PL Client
> "After analyzing the transactions of our customers, It became a necessity to have a system to control the operation to drive sequencing and precision."3PL Client
#### Are you tapping into your full potential?
By integrating advanced technology and real-time data, BiggerPicture streamlines scheduling operations and minimizes manual intervention throughout the shipment lifecycle. We’re deeply committed to transforming how shipments are scheduled and managed across crucial all supply chain stakeholders. Our ultimate goal? Forge a dynamic supply chain that reacts in real-time, ensuring enhanced efficiency and resilience.

generated_description:
### BiggerPicture: Revolutionizing Scheduling in Logistics

Founded in 2019 and located in San Francisco, BiggerPicture is a forward-thinking startup that aims to transform the way scheduling is handled in the logistics sector. As part of Y Combinator’s Batch S22, this B2B SaaS company addresses a significant pain point in the industry: approximately 75% of shipments are still coordinated through outdated methods like phone calls and emails.

**Mission and Vision**  
BiggerPicture is dedicated to automating the scheduling process between trucking companies and warehouses, facilitating smoother pick-up and delivery times. Their vision is simple yet ambitious: create a seamless, real-time scheduling environment that harnesses AI to optimize logistics operations.

**The Problem They Solve**  
Manual scheduling in trucking is not only time-consuming but also fraught with inefficiencies. BiggerPicture's platform mitigates these issues by providing a unified, AI-powered scheduling solution that adapts to changes and disruptions, enhancing the overall efficiency of the supply chain. It's about moving beyond outdated methods to a digital-first approach where data drives decision-making.

**Current Offerings**  
BiggerPicture’s suite of services includes:
- **Dock Management**: Streamlining the docking processes.
- **Carrier Scheduler**: Facilitating better scheduling connections between carriers and warehouses.

They leverage predictive analytics to ensure that shipments are delivered on time, managing all stakeholders—shippers, carriers, and warehouses—within one robust platform.

**Customer Experiences**  
Testimonials highlight the seamless integration of BiggerPicture’s solutions into existing workflows, with some users noting the critical ability to adapt to fluctuating demand and supply chain disruptions. Their technology stands out for fostering real-time collaboration, allowing all partners to stay aligned and responsive.

**The Team**  
BiggerPicture operates with a compact team of five dedicated employees. They benefit from the guidance and expertise of Jared Friedman, their Group Partner from Y Combinator, which has provided them with essential support in their growth journey.

**Why It Matters**  
Logistics is the backbone of trade and business, and as the world grows more connected, efficient scheduling becomes increasingly vital. BiggerPicture's approach is not just about convenience—it's about building an agile supply chain that can react dynamically to challenges as they arise.

If you’re in the logistics sector and are tired of the inefficiencies inherent in manual scheduling, take a moment to explore BiggerPicture. They’re committed to redefining how we think about scheduling and supply chain management, making your operations not only smarter but also significantly more resilient.

For more information or to book a demo, check out their website: [BiggerPicture](http://biggerpicture.co).
